preference.name: attributes
preference.label: Attributes to display
preference.description: Comma seperated list of attributes that should be displayed in the PoI info window

preference.name: comp_attributes
preference.label: Composite attributes
preference.description: For attributes containing multiple subattributes, choose the subattribute(s) to display in the info window. Comma seperated list of key-value pairs (format: attribute=subattr_1&subattr_2).

preference.name: unit_attributes
preference.label: Unit values
preference.description: Unit values for the corresponding sensors. Comma seperated list of key-value pairs (format: sensor=unit_attr).

inputendpoint.name: friendlyEntInput
inputendpoint.label: Friendly name entity
inputendpoint.description: Entity containing the friendly names for PoI attributes. For displaying PoI ID and type, the friendly name entity must contain the attributes "entity_id" and "entity_type".
